publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3580# Bill Aitken: Glasgow Acute Health Services Review-That the Parliament notes the continued and growing concern of Glasgow residents regarding the Scottish Executive's proposals following the recent Acute Health Services Review in Glasgow.

S1M-3580# Bill Aitken: Glasgow Acute Health Services Review-That the Parliament notes the continued and growing concern of Glasgow residents regarding the Scottish Executive's proposals following the recent Acute Health Services Review in Glasgow.
S1M-3580# Glasgow Acute Health Services Review (lodged on 13 November 2002) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3580# Glasgow Acute Health Services Review (lodged on 13 November 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-3580# Bill Aitken: Glasgow Acute Health Services Review—That the Parliament notes the continued and growing concern of Glasgow residents regarding the Scottish Executive’s proposals following the recent Acute Health Services Review in Glasgow. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3580# Glasgow Acute Health Services Review (lodged on 13 November 2002) Fiona McLeod*
